wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Edward Rory Guinness, 4th Earl of Iveagh,  (born 25 August 1969), styled Viscount Elveden until 1992, is an Anglo-Irish aristocrat and businessman. He is a member of the Guinness family.

link_mentions.page: List of earls in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: * Edward Guinness, 4th Earl of Iveagh (born 1969), Anglo-Irish aristocrat and businessman
